title: So hey riot, whats this?
body:
i literally clicked home after checking out my profile and this popped up, whats up?

http://i.imgur.com/11m93tq.png

replies.body:
Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722

Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.

(Credits to Targon's Blade for the last step)

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=O3jVhHEA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-17T03:28:18.685+0000)
>
> Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for &#x27;Reinstall&#x27; and &#x27;Clean Uninstall&#x27;, then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn&#x27;t carry over, then reinstalls the game.
> 
> http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722
> 
> Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.
> 
> (Credits to Targon's Blade for the last step)

just hitting reinstall fixed it, thanks!
Welcomed! May the Snowdown Spirit be with you!

This issue specifically seems to be isolated with the updated client.  Aside from a reinstall you can simply return to the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
